verbs.description: As [ARG1: the new tax cuts] [V: ushered] [ARG2: in] [ARGM-ADV: solely] [ARG0: by Republicans] begin to take effect , one Democratic congressman is unveiling a repeal plan , signaling that President Donald Trump 's primary opposition is serious about reversing his signature legislative achievement .
